# My Graph

```{r my_graph, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

# Generate some example data
data <- data.frame(
  x = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
  y = c(10, 8, 6, 4, 2)
)

# Create a scatter plot using ggplot2
ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "X-axis", y = "Y-axis") +
  ggtitle("My Scatter Plot")
```
